text: Ise$, macci ma tezzim udmawen nnwen, ar ugmuv akked utaram. Maca, ise$ d wid iumnen s Oebbi, s wass aneggaru, s lmalayek, s Tazmamt, s lambiyya. U ppaken ayla, $ef lemeibba S, i llzem, igujilen, igellilen, win d ibbwi ubrid, imapparen, akw i uberru n waklan. D wid ipeallan, ipzekkin, ippaiiafen di lemaahda nnsen, ma aahden, iueboiyen di lmeena akked twa$it, di tegwnip n ccqa. D wigi i illan di tidep, d wigi i ipeezziben
